mapper.insert: insert into joinpension(pemail, pname, ppasswd, zipcode, addrload, addrdetail) values (#{pemail}, #{pname},#{ppasswd}, #{zipcode}, #{addrload}, #{addrdetail})
mapper.update: update joinpension set pname = #{pname}, ppasswd = #{ppasswd}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, addrload = #{addrload}, addrdetail = #{addrdetail} where email = #{pemail}
mapper.select: select * from joinpension where ${findkey} like concat('%', '#{findvalue}', '%')
